page.title: 19Playground games, Kesgrave
page.content:
Freeze-touch is a very good game and the person who is Â£it' has to try to touch other players. When he does this the other person cannot move until he is touched again by another player. The aim is to Â£freeze' everyone.
It, Tig or Tag is another game we pla. One person who is Â£it' has to try to touch one of the other players. When he does the other player is Â£it'. The objective is to avoid being Â£it'.
In Â£Car Capers' each player has four lives. The player who is Â£it' must touch another player who then loses one his lives. If a player loses all four of his lives he moves over to the side of the player who is Â£it'. The aim is to save your lives.
